sentences.english: The traditional view is that Regaining Educational Right of the National governments in Nanjing is ostensible.

sentences.english: At many companies, the annual meeting is a waste of time because exhibitionists turn it into a sideshow.
sentences.chinese: 在许多公司股东会只是浪费时间，因为大多流于形式。

sentences.english: But the present jury system of our country has become a mere formality because of all kinds of reasons.
sentences.chinese: 但由于各种原因，当前我国陪审制度已基本流于形式。

sentences.english: This doctrine soon send empty talk without it.
sentences.chinese: 这一派的学说不久也流于空谈无实。

sentences.english: But rivers flow tirelessly to the sea, never ending in exhaustion.
sentences.chinese: 而江水汲汲流于海，终弗竭也。

sentences.english: Other people drink too much alcohol.
sentences.chinese: 也有其他人很轻易就流于酗酒。

sentences.english: These Phenomenon and still formal training is wide spread exist.
sentences.chinese: 为培训而培训，培训流于形式的现象普遍存在。

sentences.english: In this way, the so-called assets declaration system also too formalistic doctrine.
sentences.chinese: 这样，所谓的财产申报制度也就未免流于形式主义。

sentences.english: When it comes to character depicting, his prose dips into the ordinary.
sentences.chinese: 当涉笔于人物描写时，他的文章就流于平庸了。
